# Shadow Arrow (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[4th Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 4]], Justice of weald and woe 4, [[4th Level Ranger Spells|Ranger 4]], [[4th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 4]], [[4th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 4]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 8th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 8]]

**Casting Time:** 1 swift action

**Components:** V, M (masterwork arrow or bolt)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** One masterwork arrow or bolt

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Champions of Ruin (WotC)Â­, pg. 34

This spell is cast upon a masterwork arrow or bolt, transforming it into pure black shadow. Make a ranged touch attack with the missile instead of a normal ranged attack. Instead of dealing normal damage, a *shadow arrow* deals 1d6 points of Strength damage. The arrow or bolt must be fired during the same round the spell is cast, or the magic dissipates and is lost. The projectile is destroyed even if it misses its target.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* Added Sorcerer 4, Wizard 4 to Level.

Note: Using *shadow arrow* in conjunction with spells such as *[[Abundant Ammunition (Spell)|abundant ammunition]], [[Dolorous Blow (Spell)|dolorous blow]], [[Hunter's Mercy, Greater (Spell)|greater hunter's mercy]], [[Keen (MagWpnSpcAb)|keen]], [[Spellslayer Arrow (Spell)|spellslayer arrow]], [[True Strike (Spell)|true strike]],* and other spells that enhance a weapon and/or ammunition (especially a bow or crossbow) makes it extremely effective.
